GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.27 to before v4.19.247
GSD.description:
x86/delay: Fix the wrong asm constraint in delay_loop()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.247 by commit 12ffed97ae3303c3c4bc772c9329a9977a9941d6, it was introduced in version v2.6.27 by commit e01b70ef3eb3080fecc35e15f68cd274c0a48163. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: x86/delay: Fix the wrong asm constraint in delay_loop()
